name: Low-Carb Pancakes or Crepes
author: Larissa McDowell
summary: Serve topped with cream cheese or whipped cream and a selection of berries, or maple syrup.
directions: Preheat an electric griddle to 225 degrees F (107 degrees C)
Blend eggs and cream cheese in a blender until smooth
Add maple syrup, coconut flour, and cinnamon; blend until batter is smooth
Spray the preheated griddle with cooking spray
Pour batter onto the griddle to form small pancakes
Cook until edges set and do not tear when lifted with a spatula, 5 to 7 minutes
Flip pancakes gently with 2 rubber spatulas
Cook until second side is set, about 5 minutes
Repeat with remaining batter, spraying griddle between batches
